T02D1209:309a-1: aa bhi sa ma ya kra ma n'a ma /
T02D1209:309a-3: mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1209:309a-4: dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1209:309a-5: dpal au dyan nas 'ongs pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud
T02D1209:309a-6: kyi rin po che'i mngon par rtogs pa bstan par
T02D1209:309a-7: bya ste / byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa
T02D1209:309a-8: gnyis 'bab pa'i rtsa rnams ni kun rdzob dang don
T02D1209:309a-9: dam pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1209:309a-10: de rnams kyi gtso mo ni gsum ste /
T02D1209:309b-0: brkyang ma ni shes rab kyi rang @309b bzhin no //
T02D1209:309b-1: ro ma ni thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1209:309b-2: kun 'dar ma ni skye gnas kyi 'khor lor gnyis su med pa'i de kho na'i gzugs so //
T02D1209:309b-3: mi bskyod 'bab pa ni brkyang ma'o //
T02D1209:309b-5: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa ni kun 'dar ma'o //
T02D1209:309b-6: chos rnams thams cad kyi shin tu phra ba nyid ni brkyang ma'o //
T02D1209:309b-7: chos rnams thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid ni ro ma'o //
T02D1209:309b-8: mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid can ni kun 'dar ma'o //
T02D1209:309b-9: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de rnams kyi gnas dang /
T02D1209:309b-10: rang bzhin brjod par bya ste /
T02D1209:309b-11: rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong la mi phyed ma ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-12: byin pa phra gzugs ma ni nam mkha' dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1209:309b-13: brla g-yon par brtse ba ma ni 'dod pa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-14: skye gnas kyi g-yon pa'i ngos kyi rtsa la g-yon
T02D1209:309b-15: pa ma ni bzang po'i de kho na 'dzin pa
T02D1209:309b-16: shes rab kyi gnas kyi phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-17: lte ba ru thung du ma ni rgyal chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1209:309b-18: snying gi ze 'bru la g-yon pa'i cha la rus
T02D1209:309b-19: sbal skyes ma ni srid pa dang mya ngan las
T02D1209:309b-20: 'das pa kha sbyar gzugs kyi phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-21: nu ma g-yon par bsgom pa ma ni bde ba chen po'i bsgom pa'o //
T02D1209:309b-22: mgul ba g-yon pa'i cha la dbang ma ni dri ma med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-23: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du skyon ma ni thal
T02D1209:309b-24: lcag la sogs pas 'gyur par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1209:309b-25: // chu la 'jug ma ni bde ba chen po 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-26: mkhur tshos sum mo ni kun bzhi mthong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-27: mig g-yon par mtshan mo ni bde ba chen po'i 'khrus pa'i bdag can no //
T02D1209:309b-28: rna ba g-yon pa'i rtsa bar bsil sbyin ma ni rlung rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-29: klad pa g-yon pa'i ngos su tsha ba ma ni me dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-30: spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i g-yon ngos
T02D1209:309b-31: su brkyang ma ni rnam par rtse ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1209:309b-32: gyi phyir ro // mdun du kun 'dar ma ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-33: g-yas par ro ma ni myang bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-34: rgyab nas tshad ma ni sku la sogs pa'i tshad ma'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:309b-35: glad pa'i g-yas ngos su mdog nag ma ni mi bskyod pa gnag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-1: pa'i rtsa bar spyi ma ni thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-2: mig g-yas pa la rgyu sbyin ma ni byed rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-3: mkhur ba la sbyor bral ma ni dga' ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-4: ya mchu la sdu gu ma ni gnas thams cad phangs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-5: lkog ma la grub ma ni thog ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-6: lag pa g-yas pa 'tshed ma ni sgeg pa'i ro rgyas par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-7: nu ma g-yas pa la yid bzang ma ni lus
T02D1209:310a-8: kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba yid bzangs 'thob pa'i phyir
T02D1209:310a-9: ro // snying ga g-yas ngos su sum skor ma
T02D1209:310a-10: dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1209:310a-11: ro // phyir ro // lte ba g-yas pa'i yul
T02D1209:310a-12: du 'dod ma ni 'dod pa la sdug pa'i phyir
T02D1209:310a-13: ro // phyir ro // ro // skye gnas su
T02D1209:310a-14: khyim ma ni 'byung ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi
T02D1209:310a-15: ro // phyir ro // ro // phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-16: brla la gtum bdag ma ni bde ba chen pos
T02D1209:310a-17: thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-18: byin pa la ka ta ya n'a ni bgegs gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-19: g-yas pa'i mthe bong la bdud 'dral ma ni sdug bsngal thams cad 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-20: rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po la gnas ji lta bar yi ge bcu drug dang /
T02D1209:310a-21: tshes gcig la sogs pa nyin mo yang rim pa dang /
T02D1209:310a-22: rim pa las bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1209:310a-23: rtsa de rnams ni srid pa gsum yongs su gyur pa /
T02D1209:310a-24: sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis bde ba chen pos yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D1209:310a-25: a'a li ni aa'i rnam pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1209:310a-26: k'a li ni ka'i rnam pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1209:310a-27: rdo rje dang padma dang thabs shes rab bo //
T02D1209:310a-28: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1209:310a-35: ae'i rnam pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas dang /
T02D1209:310a-37: dga' ba dang lha mo spyan no //
T02D1209:310a-38: wam gyi rnam par rdo rje dang /
T02D1209:310a-42: ma'i rnam pa ni che ba dang /
T02D1209:310a-44: dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1209:310a-46: y'a'i rnam pa ni gsher ba nyid dang /
T02D1209:310b-0: @310b mngon bar 'dus ma byas pa dang /
T02D1209:310b-3: skye gnas su sbrul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug
T02D1209:310b-4: cu rtsa bzhi la ka la sogs pa'i yi ge
T02D1209:310b-5: sum cu gnyis po rnams ni rim pa dang rim
T02D1209:310b-6: pa ma yin pas yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi'o
T02D1209:310b-7: // padma 'dab ma bzhi po re re la sogs
T02D1209:310b-8: pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid bcu drug gi yi
T02D1209:310b-9: ge rnam par dag pa spyan la sogs pa rang
T02D1209:310b-10: bzhin gyis yongs su gyur pa 'dab ma drug cu
T02D1209:310b-11: rtsa bzhi'i rnam par skyes pa gnas kyi 'khor lo'o
T02D1209:310b-12: // // snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1209:310b-13: brgyad par yi ge brgyad de aa ka tsa ta
T02D1209:310b-14: ta pa ya sha 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las
T02D1209:310b-15: // // gyur pa / gzugs shin tu phra ba'o //
T02D1209:310b-17: lkog mar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1209:310b-18: bcu drug la aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri
T02D1209:310b-19: r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam aa:/
T02D1209:310b-20: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa ni
T02D1209:310b-21: lo bcu drug ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rnam pa'i
T02D1209:310b-22: shes rab bo // de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1209:310b-23: spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1209:310b-24: sum cu rtsa gnyis la ka kha ga gha nga
T02D1209:310b-31: skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa ni 'dab ma sum rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1209:310b-32: 'khro lo bzhi la grags ji lta bas skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02D1209:310b-36: bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal ba dang /
T02D1209:310b-40: de kho na bzhi ni bdag gi de kho na dang /
T02D1209:310b-41: sngags kyi de kho na dang /
T02D1209:310b-43: ye shes kyi de kho na'o //
T02D1209:310b-44: dga' ba bzhin ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1209:310b-46: dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1209:310b-47: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1209:310b-48: sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang /
T02D1209:310b-49: thams cad yod par smra ba dang /
T02D1209:310b-52: de rnams skad cig ma dang /
T02D1209:310b-54: de kho na dbye ba dang /
T02D1209:310b-55: sde'i rang bzhin gyi chung du dang /
T02D1209:311a-0: @311a * // ches lhag pa nyid kyis gnas bzhi la rnam par gnas so //
T02D1209:311a-6: 'pho ba bcu drug ni lug dang /
T02D1209:311a-18: zla ba gzas zin pa dang /
T02D1209:311a-19: nyi ma gzas zin pa dang /
T02D1209:311a-22: de rnams ni 'pho ba bcu drug la sogs pa spom po'o //
T02D1209:311a-23: yang na khu ba'i g-yon skor dang /
T02D1209:311a-24: g-yas skor gyi dbye bas gnas bcu drug tu 'pho bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1209:311a-25: mthe bong la tshes gcig la aa'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1209:311a-26: byin pa la gnyis la a'a'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-27: bral la gsum la ai'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-28: skye gnas su bzhi la a'a'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-29: lte bar lnga la au'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-30: snying la drug la a'u'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-31: nu ma la bdun la ri'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-32: lkog ma la brgyad la r'i'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-33: lag pa'i rtse mor dgu la li'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-34: mkhur tshos la bcu la l'i'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-35: mig tu bcu gcig la ae'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-36: rna ba'i rtsa bar bcu gnyis la ai'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-37: bcu gsum la dpral bar ao'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-38: spyi bor bcu bzhi la aoo'i rnam pa /
T02D1209:311a-39: mchan gyi g-yon dang g-yas su gang ba la aam
T02D1209:311a-40: aa: de dang de'i chang gi shin tu phra ba'i
T02D1209:311a-42: dbyi gu drug cu rtsa bzhi ni dus kyi rnam pa'i cha la rgyu skar nyi shu brgyad dang /
T02D1209:311a-45: cha bcu gnyis dus kyi rnam pa'i cha yis dbyi gu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1209:311a-48: sbu gu can drug cu dang /
T02D1209:311a-49: de dag nyid la zad pa dang /
T02D1209:311a-51: de nyid kyi phyir dus kyis dbyi gu drug cu rtsa bzhi gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1209:311a-53: thabs dag la don dam pa dang /
T02D1209:311a-54: kun rdzob kyi dbye bas de dang de la gnas
T02D1209:311a-55: nyid du rnam par dag pa 'pho ba bcu drug
T02D1209:311a-56: gis myos byed kyi dbye bas dbyi gu gzung ngo
T02D1209:311a-57: // de rnams ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams so //
T02D1209:311a-58: de rnams thams cad ni 'khor lo bzhi la bsdu ba rnams so //
T02D1209:311b-0: yang @311b bzhi ni lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen mor thim mo //
